# Варианты визуального отображения таблицы Run Tests

## Вариант 1: Таблица (текущий) - строки = размеры, столбцы = presets

### Run Tests

| | `relwithdebinfo` | `release-asan` | `release-msan` | `release-tsan` |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `small&medium` | [![▶ Run tests (small&medium for relwithdebinfo)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(small%26medium%20for%20relwithdebinfo)-4caf50)](url) | [![▶ Run tests (small&medium for release-asan)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(small%26medium%20for%20release-asan)-ff9800)](url) | [![▶ Run tests (small&medium for release-msan)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(small%26medium%20for%20release-msan)-2196F3)](url) | [![▶ Run tests (small&medium for release-tsan)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(small%26medium%20for%20release-tsan)-9c27b0)](url) |
| `large` | [![▶ Run tests (large for relwithdebinfo)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(large%20for%20relwithdebinfo)-4caf50)](url) | [![▶ Run tests (large for release-asan)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(large%20for%20release-asan)-ff9800)](url) | [![▶ Run tests (large for release-msan)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(large%20for%20release-msan)-2196F3)](url) | [![▶ Run tests (large for release-tsan)](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%96%B6%20Run%20tests%20(large%20for%20release-tsan)-9c27b0)](url) |
